DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Firebird::Common(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Firebird::Common(3)

NAME

DBIx::Class::Storage::DBI::Firebird::Common - Driver Base Class for the Firebird RDBMS

DESCRIPTION

This class implements autoincrements for Firebird using "RETURNING" as well as auto_nextval, savepoints and server version detection.

CAVEATS

•
"last_insert_id" support by default only works for Firebird versions 2 or greater, auto_nextval however should work with earlier versions.

AUTHOR

See "AUTHOR" in DBIx::Class and "CONTRIBUTORS" in DBIx::Class.
